title: Decades later, Faryal and Jamal reveal 1992 divorce truth
desc: Senior Pakistani actors Faryal Gohar and Jamal Shah have revealed the real reason behind their divorce after more than 30 years. They said personal freedom and unresolved differences led to their separation in 1992. The disclosure answers a long-standing question that affected fans who once viewed them as an ideal couple. The former couple shared these details during a private television Ramadan transmission.
